html:
{{doc.name}}

Vehicle Accident Report

EMPLOYEE DETAILS

Employee ID {{doc.emp_id or ''}} Date {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.time or '')}}
QID Number {{doc.qid_no or ''}} Employee Name {{doc.name1 or ''}}
Department {{doc.dept or ''}} Date of Joining {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date or '')}}
Company {{doc.company or ''}} Designation {{doc.designation or ''}}

VEHICLE DETAILS

Plate No {{doc.plate_no or ''}} Istimara Expiry {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.istimara_expiry or '')}}
Type of Vehicle {{doc.type_of_vehicle or ''}} Current Responsibility {{doc.current_responsibility or ''}}
Make {{doc.make or ''}} Division of Vehicle {{doc.division_of_vehicle or ''}}

REQUEST DETAILS

Date & Time {{doc.time or ''}} Accident Registration(Metrash) {{doc.accident_regisration or ''}}
Date of Accident {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date_of_accident or '')}} Accident Report Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.accident_report_date or '')}}
Kilometer {{doc.kilometer or ''}} Date of Registration {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date_of_registration or '')}}
Place of Accident {{doc.place_of_accident or ''}} Traffic Report {{doc.traffic_report or ''}}
Remarks

For Office Use

Description of the Vehicle Accident:{{doc.small_text_27 or ''}}


Note: The condition of the vehicle needs to be checked by the Auto technician and Admin Dept. shall do receive and handover function only.
name: Vehicle Accident Report
